pkgmetadata.longdescription: New Experimental Design Based Subsampling Methods for Big Data // Subsampling methods for big data under different models and assumptions. Starting with linear regression and leading to Generalised Linear Models, softmax regression, and quantile regression. Specifically, the model-robust subsampling method proposed in Mahendran, A., Thompson, H., and McGree, J. M. (2023) doi:10.1007/s00362-023-01446-9, where multiple models can describe the big data, and the subsampling framework for potentially misspecified Generalised Linear Models in Mahendran, A., Thompson, H., and McGree, J. M. (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2510.05902.
